Description of incident: For a period of time that has not been clearly defined the name, address, email, and taxpayer ID number (which in some cases is the physician’s Social Security number) for an undetermined number of NC physicians could be viewed on the MedSolutions website. Access to this information apparently was not limited to physicians or physician staff. Based on the information available at the time of this posting, any person with an email address could enter physician names and view the information.
